column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you are a Chicago history fan
column2: check out desk and bookshelf in the Folk Art section. It was made for the 1893 Columbian Exposition! Also
column3: check out Acrobats at the Cirque Fernando (Francisca and Angelina Wartenberg) by Renoir. It was Bertha Palmer's favorite piece and she supposedly always kept it with her
